name: HEROKU RCLONE SERVE INDEX

CONFIG_IN_URL.description: Please Paste your rclone.conf file in URL.

[team]
  type = drive
  client_id = XXXXXX
  client_secret = XXXXXX
 scope = drive
 token = {"access_token":"XXXXXX",
    "token_type":"Bearer",
    "refresh_token":"XXXXXX"}
  team_drive = XXXXXX

CLOUDNAME.description: Please enter your Cloudname/Remote that you assigned in rclone.conf file.

CLOUDPATH.description: Please enter your remote cloud path
